name: George Tziritas
content: G. Tziritas - Computer Science Dept - University of Crete Personal information Professional career Courses Selected publications Demonstrations Georgios Tziritas Georgios Tziritas is Professor at the University of Crete, Computer Science Department. Prior to that he was researcher (1982-1992) at the Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (France). Professor Tziritas has co-aurhored one book and published more than hundred twenty papersin prestigious journals and conferences of signal and image processing, multimedia, pattern recognition, medical imaging and computer vision.
